imdb.title: Re-Main
imdb.plot: The story centers on Minato Kiyoumizu, a boy who quit playing water polo after an incident during the winter of his third year of junior high school. After entering high school, he makes a promise and decides to try water polo aga...

episodes.title: Sorry, Who Are You?
episodes.plot: Minato Kiyomizu quit water polo after an accident left him with no memory of junior high, but a promise has him picking it up again.

episodes.title: I'm No Prodigy
episodes.plot: After meeting an old acquaintance he has forgotten, Minato decides to play water polo after all, but the team is too small.

episodes.title: But, Give Us a Hendy
episodes.plot: The water polo team captain has his candidate chosen for the 7th member of the team: a top swimmer. Unfortunately, he would rather run track.

episodes.title: This Ain't Looking Good...
episodes.plot: Now that the team has a seventh member, they are ready to compete for the first time.

episodes.title: Ew, That's Scary!!!
episodes.plot: After a big disappointment, the team may be down to six members again. Minato tries to discover what made him good at water polo in the first place.

episodes.title: Hey! Look this way!
episodes.plot: The team works through the possibility of losing two different members at the same time as they figure out strategies to maximize their potential.

episodes.title: Auspicious Day
episodes.plot: Minato is beginning to discover the joy of water polo again, but the team needs some building if they are going to be able to take on other schools.

episodes.title: Who Are These Guys?
episodes.plot: After having made an unexpected discovery about himself before his amnesia, Minato has rediscovered some of his memories. What he finds leaves him horrified.

episodes.title: It's the only way I know to win
episodes.plot: Minato tries to make himself stronger so that he can compete against his old team. Meanwhile, he uses old videos to try to piece together the missing year of his life.
